data.introduce: 国内航班详细信息查询服务可以查询指定日期的航段上的航班具体信息，如航班的起飞降落城市，空中飞行时间，航班机型，餐食等。
data.business: 国内航班详细信息查询接口对应主机指令DSG，可以查看除座位可利用情况外的其他数据，如航班的起飞降落城市，起飞降落时间，航班的空中飞行时间，航班的空中飞行距离，经停点数，航班机型，餐食等。
data.functions:
支持以航班号，舱位代码，出发日期，出发地，目的地方式进行查询航班详细信息。
支持以PNR号和航段对应的序号方式进行航班信息查询
该接口暂不支持外航。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirDetailsRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班详细信息查询请求：？","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"零售商信息","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR信息：当以PNR号方式查询时为必填项","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR信息：PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR上下文","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirDetail","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"查询详细信息：当以航班号，出发日期，航空公司，出发机场，目的机场方式查询时必填项","children":[{"name":"Airline","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码：如：CA","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出发地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"目的地机场二字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"目的地机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Cabin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位级别代码","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期：格式如：2013-05-09","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号：如：1831","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirDetailsRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班飞行信息响应","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FlightDetails","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航节详细信息集合","children":[{"name":"FlightLegDetails","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航节详细信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"目的地机场二字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"OperatingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"承运方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：MU）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机型信息","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞机型号","children":[]},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingCabinAvailability","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位可用信息","children":[{"name":"Meal","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"餐食信息","children":[{"name":"@MealCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"@CabinType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"@SequenceNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航节序号","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"@JourneyDuration","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行程时间","children":[]},{"name":"@GroundDuration","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地面停留时间","children":[]},{"name":"@OnTimeRate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"准点率","children":[]},{"name":"@Ticket","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票证类型","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期时间","children":[]},{"name":"@ArrivalDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达日期时间","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDayOfWeek","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"DOW类型","children":[]},{"name":"@LegDistance","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航节距离","children":[]},{"name":"@DateChangeNbr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"日期变更","children":[]},{"name":"@SmokingAllowed","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否允许吸烟","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TotalFlightTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总共飞行时间","children":[]},{"name":"@TotalGroundTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总共地面停留时间","children":[]},{"name":"@TotalTripTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总共旅行时间","children":[]},{"name":"@TotalMiles","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总飞行里程","children":[]},{"name":"@StopQuantity","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"经停数","children":[]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office prermission denied ","msgZh":" 没有office权限 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" Ibe exception ","msgZh":" ibe异常 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" input error ","msgZh":" 输入错误 "},{"code":" -10009 ","name":null,"msg":" date is not valid ","msgZh":" 日期时间错误 "},{"code":" -10060 ","name":null,"msg":" pnr does not exist ","msgZh":" pnr不存在 "},{"code":" -24000  ","name":null,"msg":" special characters that cannot be decoded  ","msgZh":" 返回结果有无法解码的特殊字符  "}]

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 以航班号+航空公司代码+出发地+目的地+舱位代码方式查询
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirDetailsRQ>
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191"/>
	</POS>
	<AirDetail DepartureDate="2013-06-10" FlightNumber="1531" Cabin="Y">
		<Airline Code="CA"/>
		<DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK"/>
		<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA"/>
	</AirDetail>
</OTA_AirDetailsRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirDetailsRS>
	<FlightDetails TotalFlightTime="PT2H30M" TotalMiles="0" StopQuantity="0">
		<FlightLegDetails FlightNumber="1531" DepartureDateTime="2013-06-10T15:55:00" ArrivalDateTime="2013-06-10T18:25:00">
			<DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK"/>
			<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA"/>
			<Equipment AirEquipType="330"/>
			<MarketingCabinAvailability CabinType="Y">
				<Meal MealCode="S"/>
			</MarketingCabinAvailability>
			<MarketingAirline Code="CA"/>
		</FlightLegDetails>
	</FlightDetails>
</OTA_AirDetailsRS>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 以PNR号+航段序号方式进行查询
qaApiDemos.response:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirDetailsRS>
	<FlightDetails TotalFlightTime="PT1H40M" TotalMiles="0" StopQuantity="0">
		<FlightLegDetails FlightNumber="5641" DepartureDateTime="2013-07-05T18:15:00" ArrivalDateTime="2013-07-05T19:55:00">
			<DepartureAirport LocationCode="XIY"/>
			<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="KWE"/>
			<Equipment AirEquipType="737"/>
			<MarketingCabinAvailability CabinType="Z">
				<Meal MealCode=" "/>
			</MarketingCabinAvailability>
			<MarketingAirline Code="KN"/>
		</FlightLegDetails>
	</FlightDetails>
</OTA_AirDetailsRS>
